<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/#a048d7ea6a08f90db101b47ef7222dcbc">AlignVectors</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This code tries to replace unaligned vector loads/stores with aligned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ones.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Consider unaligned load:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %v = original&#95;load %some&#95;addr, align &lt;bad&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %user = %v</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It will generate</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      = load ..., align &lt;good&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      = load ..., align &lt;good&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      = valign</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      etc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %synthesize = combine/shuffle the loaded data so that it looks</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                 exactly like what &quot;original&#95;load&quot; has loaded.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %user = %synthesize</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Similarly for stores.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">ByteSpan &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A representation of &quot;interesting&quot; bytes within a given span of memory.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// These bytes are those that are loaded or stored, and they don&#39;t have</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to cover the entire span of memory.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The representation works by picking a contiguous sequence of bytes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from somewhere within a llvm::Value, and placing it at a given offset</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// within the span.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The sequence of bytes from llvm:Value is represented by Segment.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Block is Segment, plus where it goes in the span.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// An important feature of ByteSpan is being able to make a &quot;section&quot;,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// i.e. creating another ByteSpan corresponding to a range of offsets</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// relative to the source span.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#aa8ce48899670ed2da3d6dd1f562b31a0">Segment</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Segment of a Value: &#39;Len&#39; bytes starting at byte &#39;Begin&#39;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#aa8ce48899670ed2da3d6dd1f562b31a0"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#aa8ce48899670ed2da3d6dd1f562b31a0">Segment</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#a7cece7285c41ad8efac8ad906646791a">Val</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Begin, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Len)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">          : <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#a7cece7285c41ad8efac8ad906646791a">Val</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#a7cece7285c41ad8efac8ad906646791a">Val</a>), <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#a061743b1d11dd9c92319c52160830744">Start</a>(Begin), <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#af723c36f8d7d9648f10b829aa50882e1">Size</a>(Len) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#a1d5b04a66f517f289215a4f476022f9b"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#a1d5b04a66f517f289215a4f476022f9b">Segment</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/segment/#aa8ce48899670ed2da3d6dd1f562b31a0">Segment</a> &amp;Seg) = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// VS2017 and some versions of VS2019 have trouble compiling this:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Pred, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">... <Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/#a68730de8f6af0b0356aac875afbe86bc"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac9a7de5a04920954ac964059cfc428ad">erase&#95;if</a>(std::map&lt;Ts...&gt; &amp;map, Pred p)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Pred, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> U&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac9a7de5a04920954ac964059cfc428ad">erase&#95;if</a>(std::map&lt;T, U&gt; &amp;map, Pred p)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = map.begin(), e = map.end(); i != e;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (p(&#42;i))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="normal">      i = map.erase(i);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="normal">      i = std::next(i);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Forward other erase&#95;ifs to the LLVM implementations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/#aca2b0b97ce262f539dc770f4ff2c0d08"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Pred, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac9a7de5a04920954ac964059cfc428ad">erase&#95;if</a>(T &amp;&amp;container, Pred p) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac9a7de5a04920954ac964059cfc428ad">llvm::erase&#95;if</a>(std::forward&lt;T&gt;(container), p);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// namespace</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// --- Begin AlignVectors</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For brevity, only consider loads. We identify a group of loads where we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// know the relative differences between their addresses, so we know how they</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are laid out in memory (relative to one another). These loads can overlap,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// can be shorter or longer than the desired vector length.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ultimately we want to generate a sequence of aligned loads that will load</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// every byte that the original loads loaded, and have the program use these</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loaded values instead of the original loads.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We consider the contiguous memory area spanned by all these loads.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Let&#39;s say that a single aligned vector load can load 16 bytes at a time.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the program wanted to use a byte at offset 13 from the beginning of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// original span, it will be a byte at offset 13+x in the aligned data for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// some x&gt;=0. This may happen to be in the first aligned load, or in the load</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// following it. Since we generally don&#39;t know what the that alignment value</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is at compile time, we proactively do valigns on the aligned loads, so that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// byte that was at offset 13 is still at offset 13 after the valigns.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This will be the starting point for making the rest of the program use the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// data loaded by the new loads.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For each original load, and its users:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %v = load ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   ... = %v</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   ... = %v</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we create</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %new&#95;v = extract/combine/shuffle data from loaded/valigned vectors so</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//            it contains the same value as %v did before</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// then replace all users of %v with %new&#95;v.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   ... = %new&#95;v</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   ... = %new&#95;v</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AlignVectors::ByteSpan::extent() <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> -&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>() == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Min = Blocks&#91;0&#93;.Pos;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a81a0fae24e6bdfe240da4249a8da5978a6a061313d22e51e0f25b7cd4dc065233">Max</a> = Blocks&#91;0&#93;.Pos + Blocks&#91;0&#93;.Seg.Size;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 1, e = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmreflect-cpp/#ac934769d93af95250952646a3829df4c">size</a>(); i != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/numbers/#a92f4283d4e0e2ea1776894b3ae93640f">e</a>; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="normal">    Min = std::min(Min, Blocks&#91;i&#93;.Pos);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a81a0fae24e6bdfe240da4249a8da5978a6a061313d22e51e0f25b7cd4dc065233">Max</a> = std::max(Max, Blocks&#91;i&#93;.Pos + Blocks&#91;i&#93;.Seg.Size);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a81a0fae24e6bdfe240da4249a8da5978a6a061313d22e51e0f25b7cd4dc065233">Max</a> - Min;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AlignVectors::ByteSpan::section(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Start, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878af6d9f1c7b49b7601fae6a545002a6763">Length</a>) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> -&gt; ByteSpan &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="normal">  ByteSpan <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/armbuildattrs/#aea10ca6bf098a425d51ac7fe65d30ed6a69c8a3bdf3f5753779a342f0cd97c090">Section</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/alignvectors/bytespan/block">ByteSpan::Block</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a> : Blocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a> = std::max(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Pos, Start);                       </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Left end.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a> = std::min(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Pos + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Seg.Size, Start + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878af6d9f1c7b49b7601fae6a545002a6763">Length</a>); </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Right end+1.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (L &lt; R) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// How much to chop off the beginning of the segment:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/isainfo/#ab6e8b39aa26af871d8ede5fa8c791ee6ad15305d7a4e34e02489c74a5ef542f36">Off</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a> &gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Pos ? <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a> - <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.Pos : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><Highlight kind="normal">               auto MaybeInfo = this-&gt;getAddrInfo(&#42;S);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><Highlight kind="normal">               assert(MaybeInfo.has&#95;value());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><Highlight kind="normal">               return HVC.HST.isHVXVectorType(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Move all instructions to be adjacent.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Move all the loads (and dependencies) to where the first load is.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Replace Deps with the clones.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Created load does not have to be &quot;Instruction&quot; (e.g. &quot;undef&quot;).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> Loads(NumSectors + DoAlign, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We could create all of the aligned loads, and generate the valigns</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// at the location of the first load, but for large load groups, this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// could create highly suboptimal code (there have been groups of 140+</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loads in real code).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Instead, place the loads/valigns as close to the users as possible.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In any case we need to have a mapping from the blocks of VSpan (the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// span covered by the pre-existing loads) to ASpan (the span covered</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// by the aligned loads). There is a small problem, though: ASpan needs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to have pointers to the loads/valigns, but we don&#39;t have these loads</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// because we don&#39;t know where to put them yet. We find out by creating</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a section of ASpan that corresponds to values (blocks) from VSpan,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and checking where the new load should be placed. We need to attach</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1128"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this location information to each block in ASpan somehow, so we put</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// distincts values for Seg.Val in each ASpan.Blocks&#91;i&#93;, and use a map</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to store the location for each Seg.Val.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The distinct values happen to be Blocks&#91;i&#93;.Seg.Val = &amp;Blocks&#91;i&#93;,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which helps with printing ByteSpans without crashing when printing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Segments with these temporary identifiers in place of Val.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Populate the blocks first, to avoid reallocations of the vector</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// interfering with generating the placeholder addresses.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Index = 0; Index != NumSectors; ++Index)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><Highlight kind="normal">    ASpan.Blocks.emplace&#95;back(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, ScLen, Index &#42; ScLen);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Index = 0; Index != NumSectors; ++Index) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><Highlight kind="normal">    ASpan.Blocks&#91;Index&#93;.Seg.Val =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(&amp;ASpan.Blocks&#91;Index&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Multiple values from VSpan can map to the same value in ASpan. Since we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// try to create loads lazily, we need to find the earliest use for each</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value from ASpan.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;void &#42;, Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> EarliestUser;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> createLoad = &#91;&amp;&#93;(IRBuilderBase &amp;Builder, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ByteSpan &amp;VSpan,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><Highlight kind="normal">                        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MakePred) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><Highlight kind="normal">        createAdjustedPointer(Builder, AlignAddr, SecTy, Index &#42; ScLen);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1194"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a14028f7fe73a11dabc6583510cc0a355">Predicate</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195"><Highlight kind="normal">        MakePred ? makeTestIfUnaligned(Builder, AlignVal, ScLen) : nullptr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1197"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If vector shifting is potentially needed, accumulate metadata</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1198"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from source sections of twice the load width.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1199"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a> = (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a> - DoAlign) &#42; ScLen;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1200"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Width = (1 + DoAlign) &#42; ScLen;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1201"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> this-&gt;createLoad(Builder, SecTy, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>, Predicate, ScLen, True, Undef,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1202"><Highlight kind="normal">                            VSpan.section(Start, Width).values());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1203"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1204"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1205"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> moveBefore = &#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5a5fa7b4069ef3bd1ceb9f2caa315cf5ac">In</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> To) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1206"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Move In and its upward dependencies to before To.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1207"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5a5fa7b4069ef3bd1ceb9f2caa315cf5ac">In</a>-&gt;getParent() == To-&gt;getParent());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1208"><Highlight kind="normal">    DepList Deps = getUpwardDeps(&amp;&#42;In, &amp;&#42;To);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1209"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5a5fa7b4069ef3bd1ceb9f2caa315cf5ac">In</a>-&gt;moveBefore(To);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1210"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// DepList is sorted with respect to positions in the basic block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1211"><Highlight kind="normal">    InstMap <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/msgpack/#afdae9da66bac09f4b2bfc0fd9f0559e6a46f3ea056caa3126b91f3f70beea068c">Map</a> = cloneBefore(In, Deps);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1212"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#91;Old, New&#93; : Map)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1213"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5a5fa7b4069ef3bd1ceb9f2caa315cf5ac">In</a>-&gt;replaceUsesOfWith(Old, New);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1214"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1215"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1216"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Generate necessary loads at appropriate locations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1217"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Creating loads for ASpan sectors\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1218"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Index = 0; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a> != NumSectors + 1; ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In ASpan, each block will be either a single aligned load, or a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// valign of a pair of loads. In the latter case, an aligned load j</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will belong to the current valign, and the one in the previous</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// block (for j &gt; 0).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Place the load at a location which will dominate the valign, assuming</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the valign will be placed right before the earliest user.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a75d3582b0f0bc7a5123de92ada301e97">Instruction</a> &#42;PrevAt =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226"><Highlight kind="normal">        DoAlign &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a> &gt; 0 ? EarliestUser&#91;&amp;ASpan&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a> - 1&#93;&#93; : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1227"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a75d3582b0f0bc7a5123de92ada301e97">Instruction</a> &#42;ThisAt =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a> &lt; NumSectors ? EarliestUser&#91;&amp;ASpan&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a>&#93;&#93; : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Where = std::min(PrevAt, ThisAt, isEarlier)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"><Highlight kind="normal">      Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ace45cae6925c65e9d6916e09dd5b17cc">SetInsertPoint</a>(Where);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"><Highlight kind="normal">      Loads&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a>&#93; =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"><Highlight kind="normal">          createLoad(Builder, VSpan, Index, DoAlign &amp;&amp; Index == NumSectors);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We know it&#39;s safe to put the load at BasePos, but we&#39;d prefer to put</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it at &quot;Where&quot;. To see if the load is safe to be placed at Where, put</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it there first and then check if it&#39;s safe to move it to BasePos.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If not, then the load needs to be placed at BasePos.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We can&#39;t do this check proactively because we need the load to exist</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Conceptually, there is a vector of N bytes covering the addresses</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// starting from the minimum offset (i.e. Base.Addr+Start). This vector</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// represents a contiguous memory region that spans all accessed memory</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// locations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The correspondence between loaded or stored values will be expressed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in terms of this vector. For example, the 0th element of the vector</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from the Base address info will start at byte Start from the beginning</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of this conceptual vector.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This vector will be loaded/stored starting at the nearest down-aligned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// address and the amount od the down-alignment will be AlignVal:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   valign(load&#95;vector(align&#95;down(Base+Start)), AlignVal)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::set&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt; TestSet(Move.Main.begin(), Move.Main.end());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><Highlight kind="normal">  AddrList MoveInfos;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4d13fd05401d8eb0c97b9864a0eb6028">llvm::copy&#95;if</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437"><Highlight kind="normal">      BaseInfos, std::back&#95;inserter(MoveInfos),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#91;&amp;TestSet&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AddrInfo &amp;AI) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TestSet.count(AI.Inst); &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Maximum alignment present in the whole address group.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AddrInfo &amp;WithMaxAlign =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><Highlight kind="normal">      getMaxOf(MoveInfos, &#91;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AddrInfo &amp;AI) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AI.HaveAlign; &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/arg/key/#a6b334a5f83504ebc99cc59f4f333ff98">Align</a> MaxGiven = WithMaxAlign.HaveAlign;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Minimum alignment present in the move address group.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AddrInfo &amp;WithMinOffset =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><Highlight kind="normal">      getMaxOf(MoveInfos, &#91;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AddrInfo &amp;AI) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> -AI.Offset; &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AddrInfo &amp;WithMaxNeeded =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><Highlight kind="normal">      getMaxOf(MoveInfos, &#91;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AddrInfo &amp;AI) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AI.NeedAlign; &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/arg/key/#a6b334a5f83504ebc99cc59f4f333ff98">Align</a> MinNeeded = WithMaxNeeded.NeedAlign;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Set the builder&#39;s insertion point right before the load group, or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// immediately after the store group. (Instructions in a store group are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// listed in reverse order.)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1456"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a75d3582b0f0bc7a5123de92ada301e97">Instruction</a> &#42;InsertAt = Move.Main.front();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1457"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Move.IsLoad) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1458"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There should be a terminator (which store isn&#39;t, but check anyways).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(InsertAt-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>() != InsertAt-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>()-&gt;end());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MinNeeded &lt;= MaxGiven) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a> = WithMinOffset.Offset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OffAtMax = WithMaxAlign.Offset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Shift the offset of the maximally aligned instruction (OffAtMax)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// back by just enough multiples of the required alignment to cover the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// distance from Start to OffAtMax.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Calculate the address adjustment amount based on the address with the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// maximum alignment. This is to allow a simple gep instruction instead</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of potential bitcasts to i8&#42;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Adjust = -<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(OffAtMax - Start, MinNeeded.value());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><Highlight kind="normal">    AlignAddr = createAdjustedPointer(Builder, WithMaxAlign.Addr,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"><Highlight kind="normal">                                      WithMaxAlign.ValTy, Adjust, Move.Clones);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1480"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Diff = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#abee3ddc7c6eb611a3b96fb69489c81caaa6122a65eaa676f700ae68d393054a37">Start</a> - (OffAtMax + Adjust);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1481"><Highlight kind="normal">    AlignVal = HVC.getConstInt(Diff);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Diff &gt;= 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1483"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">decltype(MinNeeded.value())</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Diff) &lt; MinNeeded.value());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1484"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// WithMinOffset is the lowest address in the group,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   WithMinOffset.Addr = Base+Start.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Align instructions for both HVX (V6&#95;valign) and scalar (S2&#95;valignrb)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// mask off unnecessary bits, so it&#39;s ok to just the original pointer as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the alignment amount.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do an explicit down-alignment of the address to avoid creating an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// aligned instruction with an address that is not really aligned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><Highlight kind="normal">    AlignAddr =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><Highlight kind="normal">        createAlignedPointer(Builder, WithMinOffset.Addr, WithMinOffset.ValTy,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"><Highlight kind="normal">                             MinNeeded.value(), Move.Clones);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><Highlight kind="normal">    AlignVal =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><Highlight kind="normal">        Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aae2c1bf70058f3665edaec525457030c">CreatePtrToInt</a>(WithMinOffset.Addr, HVC.getIntTy(), </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;pti&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1497"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(AlignVal)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HvxIdioms::getNumSignificantBits(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;In) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><Highlight kind="normal">    -&gt; std::pair&lt;unsigned, Signedness&gt; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Bits = HVC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/hexagonvectorcombine/#ae250333195d50ffcc282ad8d0dd1467e">getNumSignificantBits</a>(V, In);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The significant bits are calculated including the sign bit. This may</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// add an extra bit for zero-extended values, e.g. (zext i32 to i64) may</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// result in 33 significant bits. To avoid extra words, skip the extra</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sign bit, but keep information that the value is to be treated as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// unsigned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1625"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits">KnownBits</a> Known = HVC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-hexagonvectorcombine-cpp-/hexagonvectorcombine/#ab855aa79aa2889254e75caeacc90a059">getKnownBits</a>(V, In);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><Highlight kind="normal">  Signedness Sign = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxisellowering-cpp/#ae1a90b5d85643644483b2ca70da4d13faed3fa7a5efe80dad3ea3d86cc14be246">Signed</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumToTest = 0; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Number of bits used in test for unsignedness.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1628"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(Bits))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1629"><Highlight kind="normal">    NumToTest = Bits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1630"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Bits &gt; 1 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(Bits - 1))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1631"><Highlight kind="normal">    NumToTest = Bits - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1632"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1633"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumToTest != 0 &amp;&amp; Known.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/knownbits/#ac67bca6c764da76f5e152330d92ed916">Zero</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#ab6006923d1a3139d70abc8f6552a7960">ashr</a>(NumToTest).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a423e2c491de1408d54e35f0b47d076be">isAllOnes</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1634"><Highlight kind="normal">    Sign = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxisellowering-cpp/#ae1a90b5d85643644483b2ca70da4d13fac837bff23a12c3735d463020f37979de">Unsigned</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1635"><Highlight kind="normal">    Bits = NumToTest;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1636"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1637"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1638"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the top bit of the nearest power-of-2 is zero, this value is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1639"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// positive. It could be treated as either signed or unsigned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1640"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Pow2 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5542d44947f8d964b5ce3b20ea719b44">PowerOf2Ceil</a>(Bits); Pow2 != Bits) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1726"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1727"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1728"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There are no special intrinsics that should be used for multiplying</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1729"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// signed 8-bit values, so just skip them. Normal codegen should handle</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1730"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// this just fine.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ElemWidth &lt;= 8)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1733"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Similarly, if this is just a multiplication that can be handled without</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1734"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// intervention, then leave it alone.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1735"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ElemWidth &lt;= 32 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.Frac == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1736"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1737"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1745"><Highlight kind="normal">                    InstSimplifyFolder(HVC.DL));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1746"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1747"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> roundUpWidth = &#91;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Width) -&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1748"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Width &lt;= 32 &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(Width)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1749"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the element width is not a power of 2, round it up</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1750"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to the next one. Do this for widths not exceeding 32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1751"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5542d44947f8d964b5ce3b20ea719b44">PowerOf2Ceil</a>(Width);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1752"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1753"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Width &gt; 32 &amp;&amp; Width % 32 != 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For wider elements, round it up to the multiple of 32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(Width, 32u);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1756"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Width;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1758"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1759"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1760"><Highlight kind="normal">  BitsX = roundUpWidth(BitsX);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1761"><Highlight kind="normal">  BitsY = roundUpWidth(BitsY);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1762"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1763"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For elementwise multiplication vectors must have the same lengths, so</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1764"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// resize the elements of both inputs to the same width, the max of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1765"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// calculated significant bits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1766"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Width = std::max(BitsX, BitsY);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1767"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1768"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;ResizeTy = VectorType::get(HVC.getIntTy(Width), VecTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
