<Link id="l01813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1813"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.RoundAt || &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.RoundAt == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.Frac - 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1814"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The fixed-point intrinsics do signed multiplication.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1815"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Width == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.Frac + 1 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.X.Sgn != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxisellowering-cpp/#ae1a90b5d85643644483b2ca70da4d13fac837bff23a12c3735d463020f37979de">Unsigned</a> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.Y.Sgn != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxisellowering-cpp/#ae1a90b5d85643644483b2ca70da4d13fac837bff23a12c3735d463020f37979de">Unsigned</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1816"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;QMul = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1817"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Width == 16) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1818"><Highlight kind="normal">        QMul = createMulQ15(Builder, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.X, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.Y, Rounding);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1819"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Width == 32) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1820"><Highlight kind="normal">        QMul = createMulQ31(Builder, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.X, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.Y, Rounding);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1821"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1822"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (QMul != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1823"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> QMul;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1824"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1827"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Width &gt;= 32 || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(Width)); </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Width &lt;= 32 =&gt; Width is 2^n</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1828"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Width &lt; 32 || Width % 32 == 0);       </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Width &gt; 32 =&gt; Width is 32&#42;k</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1834"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Getting here with Op.Frac == 0 isn&#39;t wrong, but suboptimal: here we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1835"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// generate a full precision products, which is unnecessary if there is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1837"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Width == 16);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1838"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.Frac != 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unshifted mul should have been skipped&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1839"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.Frac == 16) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1841"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;MulH = createMulH16(Builder, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.X, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.Y))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1860"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Break up the arguments Op.X and Op.Y into vectors of smaller widths</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1864"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WordP = createMulLong(Builder, WordX, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.X.Sgn, WordY, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.Y.Sgn);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1867"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1868"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add the optional rounding to the proper word.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1869"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.RoundAt.has&#95;value()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1870"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#a9696bc411b0a7022c2cc78bff5173cefad7ed4ee1df437474d005188535f74875">Zero</a> = HVC.getNullValue(WordX&#91;0&#93;-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/object/tapifile-cpp/#a913a691648e20063bbd278e8f02d8430">getType</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1871"><Highlight kind="normal">    SmallVector&lt;Value &#42;&gt; RoundV(WordP.size(), Zero);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1872"><Highlight kind="normal">    RoundV&#91;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.RoundAt / 32&#93; =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1873"><Highlight kind="normal">        HVC.getConstSplat(HvxWordTy, 1 &lt;&lt; (&#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.RoundAt % 32));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1874"><Highlight kind="normal">    WordP = createAddLong(Builder, WordP, RoundV);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1876"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1879"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Shift all products right by Op.Frac.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1880"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SkipWords = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.Frac / 32;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1881"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110aac2f0a84dd2aa5ee4c3f1385e9565f5e">Constant</a> &#42;ShiftAmt = HVC.getConstSplat(HvxWordTy, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.Frac % 32);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1883"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Dst = 0, End = WordP.size() - SkipWords; Dst != End; ++Dst) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1884"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a> + SkipWords;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1885"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a> = WordP&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1886"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Src + 1 &lt; End) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1887"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a> = WordP&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a> + 1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1888"><Highlight kind="normal">      WordP&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93; = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a80eec4efbded89b11092babf42a65b82">CreateIntrinsic</a>(HvxWordTy, Intrinsic::fshr,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1889"><Highlight kind="normal">                                           &#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2bac1a5298f939e87e8f962a5edfc206918">Hi</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a>, ShiftAmt&#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1890"><Highlight kind="normal">                                           </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;FMFSource&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;int&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1891"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1892"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The shift of the most significant word.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1893"><Highlight kind="normal">      WordP&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a1448a68418666ed85e07646744af82ef">Dst</a>&#93; = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#adc6a2686b807c18e4a7f7fc58e68d423">CreateAShr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9ac8e4e13ad96a39c3f8db9ed633ad2baff50b4aa1c9cc2197ef898436641c911">Lo</a>, ShiftAmt, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;asr&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1894"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1895"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1896"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SkipWords != 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1898"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1899"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HVC.joinVectorElements(Builder, WordP, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.ResTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1900"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2324"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;int, 256&gt;</a> SMask(P2Len);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2325"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i != P2Len; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2326"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If i is in &#91;Where, Where+Length), pick Src&#91;Start+(i-Where)&#93;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2327"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, pick Dst&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2328"><Highlight kind="normal">    SMask&#91;i&#93; =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2329"><Highlight kind="normal">        (Where &lt;= i &amp;&amp; i &lt; Where + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878af6d9f1c7b49b7601fae6a545002a6763">Length</a>) ? P2Len + Start + (i - Where) : i;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2546"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;int, 128&gt;</a> Mask(2 &#42; Len);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2547"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2548"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i != Len; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2549"><Highlight kind="normal">    Mask&#91;i&#93; = 2 &#42; i;           </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Even</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2629"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Break a vector of wide elements into a series of vectors with narrow</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2630"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// elements:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2631"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   (...c0:b0:a0, ...c1:b1:a1, ...c2:b2:a2, ...)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2632"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// --&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2633"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   (a0, a1, a2, ...)    // lowest &quot;ToWidth&quot; bits</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2634"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   (b0, b1, b2, ...)    // the next lowest...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2635"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   (c0, c1, c2, ...)    // ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2636"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2637"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2638"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The number of elements in each resulting vector is the same as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2639"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in the original vector.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2640"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2641"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;VecTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;VectorType&gt;</a>(Vec-&gt;getType());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2642"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(VecTy-&gt;getElementType()-&gt;isIntegerTy());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2644"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(ToWidth) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6dec2b5d3e04b47adf4d918d678e81c9">isPowerOf2&#95;32</a>(FromWidth));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2645"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ToWidth &lt;= FromWidth &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Breaking up into wider elements?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2646"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumResults = FromWidth / ToWidth;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2647"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2653"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2654"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> splitInHalf = &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Begin, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> End, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> splitFunc) -&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2655"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Take V = Results&#91;Begin&#93;, split it in L, H.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2656"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Store Results&#91;Begin&#93; = L, Results&#91;(Begin+End)/2&#93; = H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2657"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Call itself recursively split(Begin, Half), split(Half+1, End)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2658"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Begin + 1 == End)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2687"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the list of values does not have power-of-2 elements, append copies</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2688"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of the sign bit to it, to make the size be 2^n.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2689"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The reason for this is that the values will be joined in pairs, because</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2690"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// otherwise the shuffles will result in convoluted code. With pairwise</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2691"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// joins, the shuffles will hopefully be folded into a perfect shuffle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2692"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The output will need to be sign-extended to a type with element width</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2693"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// being a power-of-2 anyways.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
